title: [Bug]: Cannot switch back to company account after having temporarily used personal one
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

Cannot switch back to company account after having temporarily used personal one

### What package are you using?

flatpak

### Version

1.12.5

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1.Have a company and a personal Teams account
2.From a clean state (fresh app install/or all app data reset), log into your company account
3.In the top right corner, log out using the menu in your avatar
4.when the window refreshed to the login one, authenticate with your personal account
5.Now logout from your personal account
6.when the window refreshed to the login one, authenticate with your company account again
7.error saying the email address is unknown (see details for screenshot), although that email definitely exists
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.app state should be cleared properly, allowing to switch back and forth between work (or school) and personal accounts. I suspect it's only working well in one direction (work to personal), but not back?

Workaround was to use `Quit (Clear Storage)`
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

Screenshot of error showing when trying to authenticate on my work account again, after having temporarily used my personal one:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/24dea61f-ecfa-4bb5-addb-88af562901dc)
